divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to see what stars were like that night and look over head and saw kind of triangle 50 yards long and about 25 yards wide. Made no sound. coming from the from the west Moving east. the only thing I could see was 3 different size like antennas out of the back end. When I call my wife come and see this it seem to stop 10 seconds then continue on Look like some thing from Close encounters except this had NO lights at all I watch till got over some houses east of me and and saw it no more. My Wife didn't make it out in time she was on the pot. there no marking on the bottom. but there was box like pieces on the bottom that look part of the craft
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Marion
There were no other sightings in Marion on or around
Summary: Big and Black moving slowly 50 yards long in length.
